### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5) 

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5, y=1.0) and small-electric-pole(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5, y=3.0) and small-electric-pole(position x=3.5, y=2.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)
Consists of offshore-pump(position x=-18.5, y=27.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore-pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0) and small-electric-pole(position x=-22.5, y=30.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=1.5, y=-6.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other

### Pipe group at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other

### Pipe group at position(x=-20.5, y=25.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, including offshore-pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=-12.5, y=25.5)
Consists of a single pipe

### Pipe group at position(x=-5.5, y=25.5)
Consists of a single pipe

### Electricity group
Consists of multiple small-electric-poles connected to each other, including poles at positions (x=7.5, y=0.5), (x=17.5, y=1.5), (x=3.5, y=2.5), and others

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the entity footprint does not overlap with water or other entities before attempting to place it.
- Check the entity's position and direction before placing it.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected before attempting to connect them.
- Check the connection points of the entities before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure the entity's inventory is not full before attempting to insert items.
- Check the entity's fuel or item requirements before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when using building box
- Ensure the building box dimensions are valid and compatible with the entity being placed.
- Check the entity's tile dimensions before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using prototypes
- Ensure the prototype is valid and exists before attempting to use it.
- Check the prototype's properties and attributes before attempting to use it.
